job description:
Position Overview:

Supports patient and customer experience for UHS Hospitals and UHS Medical Group through performance improvement and data analytics initiatives. Facilitates improved transparency in patient experience data by creating and distributing ad hoc reporting and audience-specific dashboards. Analyzes and trends data, both quantitative and qualitative, to inform organizational leaders of current state and progress to goals.

Education/Experience
Minimum Required:
  • Associates degree in Applied Science in Business or related field with 4 years relevant experience
  • Strong analytical and statistical skills with the ability to interpret and present data to end users.

Preferred:
  • Bachelors of Science in Business or related field
